Package pizza.cube

Class Path

java.lang.Object
pizza.cube.Path
public class Path
extends java.lang.Object
This path contains static methods to manipulate deck file names based off of an existing string in the file name or cards it finds in the deck file.
Since:
June 11th, 2020

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Path()  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static void appendAll​(java.io.File folder, java.io.File queryFile, java.lang.String tag)
    Scans a folder and appends tags to deck file names if the deck contains key cards.
    static void appendFileName​(java.io.File deckFile, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> querySet, java.lang.String tag)
    Appends a tag to a file name based on key cards.
    static void fixExtAll​(java.io.File folder, java.lang.String ext)
    Scans a folder and rewrites file extensions
    static void replaceAll​(java.io.File folder, java.lang.String tag, java.lang.String replacement)
    Scans a folder and replaces all tags in deck files with new replacement tags.

  • Constructor Details

    • Path

      public Path()

  • Method Details

    • fixExtAll

      public static void fixExtAll​(java.io.File folder, java.lang.String ext)
      Scans a folder and rewrites file extensions
      Parameters:
      folder - folder that contains the deck files
      ext - file extension (eg. ".txt")

    • appendFileName

      public static void appendFileName​(java.io.File deckFile, java.util.Set<java.lang.String> querySet, java.lang.String tag)
      Appends a tag to a file name based on key cards.

      It will first check to see if the file name has an existing string to prevent appending the same tag multiple times.

      Parameters:
      tag - string added to the file name
      deckFile - deck file
      querySet - of key cards (eg. A list of P9)

    • appendAll

      public static void appendAll​(java.io.File folder, java.io.File queryFile, java.lang.String tag)
      Scans a folder and appends tags to deck file names if the deck contains key cards.
      Parameters:
      folder - folder of deck files
      queryFile - file of key cards
      tag - tag to append to file name

    • replaceAll

      public static void replaceAll​(java.io.File folder, java.lang.String tag, java.lang.String replacement)
      Scans a folder and replaces all tags in deck files with new replacement tags.
      Parameters:
      folder - deck file
      tag - existing tag
      replacement - tag to replace
